tool_description: Unofficial Jio Saavan API, to get details of all indian songs with its audio link
name: Jio Saavan unofficial
title: Jio Saavan unofficial

api_list.name: Get Song Link
api_list.description: Provide the encrypted_url you get for a song from its details to get the audio link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jio-saavan-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/getsong"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jio-saavan-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jio-saavan-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/getsong"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jio-saavan-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
